item.description:
Psychic Bootcamp - YES it's intense! With Helene Olsen
Sundays, March 11, 18, 25 6:30 - 8:00.
To register and prepay, email Helene: helene@AngelsLighthouse.com
Three meetings approximately 1- 1/2 hours each
$169 for all three classes, limited to 8 participants
This class is for experienced Spiritual seekers ONLY! You need an understanding that you are accessing your own intuition, your higher self and other Realms (ex. Angelic Realm, Spirit guides, Heaven, etc.) Perhaps you also use cards, pendulum or runes. You have been learning and attending classes.
We will connect with and receive Angelic attunements, learn to protect our energy and most importantly practice our unique connections as part of the group. Be prepared for the strong energetic that Helene channels from the Angelic Realm and fifth dimension to assist with your opening. Expect to work, participate in group energy, share practice readings and channeling.
item.name: Psychic Bootcamp with Helene Olsen
